flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
ひのこを　クチバシから　とばして
くさむらを　こがし　おどろいて
とびだした　えものを　つかまえる。

부리에서 불꽃을 뿜어
풀숲을 태우고 놀라서
뛰쳐나온 사냥감을 잡는다.

Il crache des étincelles pour brûler les hautes herbes
et attraper les proies surprises qui tentent d’échapper
à l’incendie.

Es speit Funken aus seinem Schnabel und fängt
die Beute, die überrascht aus dem angesengten Gras
hervorspringt.

Lanza chispas por su pico y prende fuego a la hierba
alta para así sorprender a sus presas y atraparlas
cuando intentan escapar.

Incendia i cespugli producendo scintille con il becco
e cattura le prede che ne escono spaventate.

From its beak, it expels embers that set
the tall grass on fire. Then it pounces on
the bewildered prey that pop out of the grass.

火の粉を　クチバシから　飛ばして
草むらを　焦がし　驚いて
飛び出した　獲物を　捕まえる。

おなかの　ほのおぶくろの　かりょくが
つよまるほど　はやく　とべるが
てんかするまで　じかんが　かかる。

배에 있는 불꽃 주머니의 화력이
강해질수록 빨리 날 수 있지만
점화할 때까지 시간이 걸린다.

Il possède une poche remplie de feu sur son ventre.
Plus elle émet de chaleur, plus il vole vite.
Cependant, elle met quelque temps à chauffer.

Je heißer die Flammen im Feuersack seines Bauches
lodern, desto schneller kann es fliegen. Es dauert
jedoch eine Weile, bis es zur Zündung kommt.

Cuanto más intenso sea el calor que se genera en la
saca de fuego de su vientre, más rápido es capaz de
volar. Sin embargo, la llama tarda en prender.

Nel ventre ha una sacca ardente che gli permette di
volare più velocemente in base all’intensità del fuoco,
ma per riscaldarla al punto giusto occorre del tempo.

The hotter the flame sac on its belly,
the faster it can fly, but it takes some
time to get the fire going.

お腹の　炎袋の　火力が
強まるほど　速く　飛べるが
点火するまで　時間が　かかる。

ひのこを　クチバシから　とばして

とびだした　えものを　つかまえる。

Lanza chispas por su pico y prende fuego a la hierba alta para
así sorprender a sus presas y atraparlas cuando intentan
escapar.

Incendia i cespugli producendo scintille con il becco e cattura
le prede che ne escono spaventate.

From its beak, it expels embers that set
the tall grass on fire. Then it pounces on
the bewildered prey that pop out of the grass.

草むらを　焦がし　驚いて
飛び出した　獲物を　捕まえる。

강해질수록 빨리 날 수 있지만

Il possède une poche remplie de feu sur son ventre.
Plus elle émet de chaleur, plus il vole vite. Cependant,
elle met quelque temps à chauffer.

Je heißer die Flammen im Feuersack seines Bauches lodern,
desto schneller kann es fliegen. Es dauert jedoch eine Weile,
bis es zur Zündung kommt.

Cuanto más intenso sea el calor que se genera en la saca
de fuego de su vientre, más rápido es capaz de volar. Sin
embargo, la llama tarda en prender.

Nel ventre ha una sacca ardente che gli permette di volare più
velocemente in base all’intensità del fuoco, ma per riscaldarla
al punto giusto occorre del tempo.

The hotter the flame sac on its belly,
the faster it can fly, but it takes some
time to get the fire going.

お腹の　炎袋の　火力が
強まるほど　速く　飛べるが
点火するまで　時間が　かかる。

クチバシから　ひのこを　とばして
えものに　ぶつける。　つかまえた
えものは　やいてから　いただくぞ。

부리로부터 불꽃을 날려
먹이에 맞힌다. 잡은
먹이는 구운 다음 먹는다.

從鳥嘴裡噴出火花擊向獵物。
會把捉到的獵物烤過之後再享用。

Il crache des escarbilles par le bec, en visant
sa proie. Une fois celle-ci capturée, il la fait
rôtir avant de la déguster.

Es speit Funken aus seinem Schnabel und
schreckt so die Beute auf. Einmal gefangen,
wird sie geröstet und dann verspeist.

Lanza chispas por el pico para atacar a su
presa, a la que devora una vez calcinada.

Attacca le prede scagliando scintille dal becco
e, dopo averle catturate, le arrostisce e le
mangia.

From its beak, it fires embers at its prey. Once
it has caught them, it grills them at high heat
before feasting upon them.

クチバシから　火の粉を　飛ばして
獲物に　ぶつける。　捕まえた
獲物は　焼いてから　いただくぞ。

从鸟嘴里喷出火花击中猎物。
捉到的猎物烧了之后就会享用。

はんけい　すうキロの　なわばりを
もっており　ほかの　ヒノヤコマが
はいってくることを　ゆるさない。

반경 수 km의 영역을
차지하고 있어 다른 불화살빈이
들어오는 것을 용서하지 않는다.

擁有半徑達數公里的地盤，
並且不允許其他火箭雀進入。

Son territoire s’étend sur plusieurs kilomètres.
L’intrusion d’autres Braisillon n’est en aucun cas
tolérée.

Sein Revier hat einen Radius von mehreren
Kilometern. Das Eindringen anderer Dartignis
wird nicht geduldet.

No tolera bajo ningún concepto que otro
Fletchinder invada su territorio, cuyo radio
abarca varios kilómetros.

Difende gelosamente il suo territorio, che si
estende per vari chilometri, tenendo lontani
gli altri Fletchinder.

It will not tolerate other Fletchinder entering its
territory, which has a radius of several miles.

半径　数キロの　縄張りを
持っており　他の　ヒノヤコマが
入ってくることを　許さない。

拥有半径数公里的领地，
不允许其他火箭雀进入。

くさむらに　ひのこを　まきちらす。
ほのおに　おどろいて　とびだしてきた
むしポケモンを　ぱくりと　いただく。

풀숲에 불꽃을 흩뿌린다.
불꽃에 놀라 뛰쳐나온
벌레포켓몬을 덥석 먹어 치운다.

會向草叢撒出火花，
然後趁蟲寶可夢被火焰嚇到
從草叢跳出來時大口吞食。

Il enflamme des touffes d’herbe en crachant
des escarbilles. Il n’a plus qu’à s’emparer des
Pokémon Insecte qui s’enfuient pour les gober.

Es versprüht Funken im hohen Gras und fängt
die dadurch aufgescheuchten Käfer-Pokémon
ab, indem es sie mit dem Schnabel aufpickt.

Prende fuego a los arbustos con las chispas
que suelta y aprovecha para cazar los Pokémon
Bicho que salen corriendo despavoridos.

Sparge scintille per incendiare i cespugli e fa
man bassa dei Pokémon Coleottero che saltano
fuori spaventati.

It scatters embers in the tall grass. Then bug
Pokémon, frightened by the flames, come
flying out, and Fletchinder gobbles them up.

草むらに　ひのこを　まき散らす。
炎に　驚いて　飛び出してきた
むしポケモンを　ぱくりと　いただく。

向草丛挥撒火花。
然后大口吞食被火焰吓到
从草丛跳出来的虫宝可梦。

とびはじめた　ちょくごの　スピードは
すべての　とりポケモンの　なかでも
トップクラスの　はやさ　なのだ。

날기 시작한 직후의 스피드는
모든 새포켓몬 중에서도
톱클래스 수준이다.

剛起飛時的速度
在所有的鳥寶可夢之中
是數一數二的。

À peine décolle-t-il que sa vitesse lui permet
déjà de rivaliser avec les Pokémon oiseaux
les plus rapides.

Kaum ein anderes Vogel-Pokémon gewinnt
direkt nach dem Abflug so schnell an Tempo
wie Dartignis.

La velocidad que alcanza nada más emprender
el vuelo es de las más altas de entre todos los
Pokémon pájaro.

La velocità che raggiunge subito dopo aver
spiccato il volo è una delle più alte registrate
tra i Pokémon alati.

Its speed right after takeoff already puts it in
the top speed class of all bird Pokémon.

飛びはじめた　直後の　スピードは
すべての　とりポケモンの　中でも
トップクラスの　速さ　なのだ。

刚起飞后的速度，
在所有鸟宝可梦中也是顶级的。

すあなのなかに　ひのこを　とばし　
おどろいて　でてきた　えものを
するどい　ツメで　しとめるのだ。

굴 속에 불똥을 쏜 다음
놀라서 빠져나온 먹이를
날카로운 발톱으로 잡는다.

會朝著獵物的巢穴中噴射火花，
再用銳利的爪子解決掉
受驚嚇而跑出來的獵物。

Il lance des étincelles dans le terrier de ses proies
pour les effrayer. Dès qu’elles en émergent,
il les attaque à coups de serres.

Es speit Funken in Nisthöhlen und erlegt die
erschrocken daraus hervorkommende Beute
mit seinen scharfen Krallen.

Lanza chispas al interior de la guarida de su
presa y, cuando esta sale despavorida, la ataca
por sorpresa con sus afiladas garras.

Scaglia scintille nelle tane delle prede e attacca
con i suoi artigli affilati quelle che ne escono
spaventate.

Fletchinder launches embers into the den of
its prey. When the prey comes leaping out,
Fletchinder’s sharp talons finish it off.

巣穴の中に　火の粉を　飛ばし
驚いて　出てきた　獲物を
鋭い　ツメで　しとめるのだ。

会向猎物的巢穴中喷射火花，
然后用锐利的爪子
了结受惊而出的猎物。

なわばりいしきが　とても　つよく
こうせんてき。　えさばを　めぐり
ヒノヤコマどうしで　あらそう。

영역에 대한 개념이 매우 강하고
호전적이다. 먹이 먹는 장소를 두고
불화살빈끼리 싸운다.

地盤意識很強，且性情好戰。
火箭雀彼此之間也會為了
爭奪覓食的地方而戰鬥。

De nature belliqueuse, il dispose d’un fort
instinct territorial. Quand il chasse, il se dispute
régulièrement les proies avec ses congénères.

Dieses kriegerische Pokémon hat ein stark
ausgeprägtes Revierverhalten. Es kämpft mit
anderen Dartignis um Futterplätze.

Defienden su territorio con suma agresividad.
Se pelean entre sí por el control de las áreas de
caza.

È molto territoriale e aggressivo. Si contende
il territorio di caccia con gli altri Fletchinder.

Fletchinder are exceedingly territorial and
aggressive. These Pokémon fight among
themselves over feeding grounds.

縄張り意識が　とても　強く
好戦的。　餌場を　めぐり
ヒノヤコマ同士で　争う。

领地意识很强，性格好战。
火箭雀彼此之间会为了
觅食的地方发生争斗。

ability.effect:
Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being burned.

Overworld: If any Pokémon in the party has this ability, each egg in the party has its hatch counter decreased by 2 (rather than 1) each step cycle, making eggs hatch roughly twice as quickly.  This effect does not stack if multiple Pokémon have this ability or magma armor.
ability.short_effect: Has a 30% chance of burning attacking Pokémon on contact.

move.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User flies high into the air for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

During the immune turn, gust, hurricane, sky uppercut, smack down, thunder, twister, and whirlwind still hit the user normally.  gust and twister also have double power against the user.

The damage from hail and sandstorm still applies during the immune turn.

The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of lock on, mind reader, or no guard.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
move.short_effect: User flies high into the air, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

move.effect:
Transfers 1/4 the user's max HP into a doll that absorbs damage and causes most negative move effects to fail.  If the user leaves the field, the doll will vanish.  If the user cannot pay the HP cost, this move will fail.

The doll takes damage as normal, using the user's stats and types, and will break when its HP reaches zero.  Self-inflicted damage from confusion or recoil is not absorbed.  Healing effects from opponents ignore the doll and heal the user as normal.  Moves that work based on the user's HP still do so; the doll's HP does not influence any move.

The doll will block major status effects, confusion, and flinching.  The effects of smelling salts and wake up slap do not trigger against a doll, even if the Pokémon behind the doll has the appropriate major status effect.  Multi-turn trapping moves like wrap will hit the doll for their regular damage, but the multi-turn trapping and damage effects will not activate.

Moves blocked or damage absorbed by the doll do not count as hitting the user or inflicting damage for any effects that respond to such, e.g., avalanche, counter, or a rowap berry.  magic coat still works as normal, even against moves the doll would block.  Opposing Pokémon that damage the doll with a leech move like absorb are healed as normal.

It will also block acupressure, block, the curse effect of curse, dream eater, embargo, flatter, gastro acid, grudge, heal block, leech seed, lock on, mean look, mimic, mind reader, nightmare, pain split, psycho shift, spider web, sketch, swagger, switcheroo, trick, worry seed, and yawn.  A Pokémon affected by yawn before summoning the doll will still fall to sleep.

The doll blocks intimidate, but all other abilities act as though the doll did not exist.  If the user has an ability that absorbs moves of a certain type for HP (such as volt absorb absorbing thunder wave), such moves will not be blocked.

life orb and berries that cause confusion still work as normal, but their respective HP loss and confusion are absorbed/blocked by the doll.

The user is still vulnerable to damage inflicted when entering or leaving the field, such as by pursuit or spikes; however, the doll will block the poison effect of toxic spikes.

The doll is passed on by baton pass.  It keeps its existing HP, but uses the replacement Pokémon's stats and types for damage calculation.

All other effects work as normal.
move.short_effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

move.effect:
No moves will hit the user for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail.

lock on, mind reader, and no guard provide a (100 – accuracy)% chance for moves to break through this move.  This does not apply to one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold); those are always blocked by this move.

thunder during rain dance and blizzard during hail have a 30% chance to break through this move.

The following effects are not prevented by this move:

* acupressure from an ally
* curse's curse effect
* Delayed damage from doom desire and future sight; however, these moves will be prevented if they are used this turn
* feint, which will also end this move's protection after it hits
* imprison
* perish song
* shadow force
* Moves that merely copy the user, such as transform or psych up

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.

move.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power and type are determined by the user's IVs.

Power is given by `x * 40 / 63 + 30`.  `x` is obtained by arranging bit 1 from the IV for each of Special Defense, Special Attack, Speed, Defense, Attack, and HP in that order.  (Bit 1 is 1 if the IV is of the form `4n + 2` or `4n + 3`.  `x` is then 64 * Special Defense IV bit 1, plus 32 * Special Attack IV bit 1, etc.)

Power is always between 30 and 70, inclusive.  Average power is 49.5.

Type is given by `y * 15 / 63`, where `y` is similar to `x` above, except constructed from bit 0.  (Bit 0 is 1 if the IV is odd.)  The result is looked up in the following table.

Value | Type
----: | --------
    0 | fighting
    1 | flying
    2 | poison
    3 | ground
    4 | rock
    5 | bug
    6 | ghost
    7 | steel
    8 | fire
    9 | water
   10 | grass
   11 | electric
   12 | psychic
   13 | ice
   14 | dragon
   15 | dark

This move thus cannot be normal.  Most other types have an equal 1/16 chance to be selected, given random IVs.  However, due to the flooring used here, bug, fighting, and grass appear 5/64 of the time, and dark only 1/64 of the time.
move.short_effect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.

If two Pokémon use this move on the same turn, the faster Pokémon will steal the first beneficial move, and the slower Pokémon will then steal it again—thus, only the slowest Pokémon using this move ultimately gains a stolen move's effect.

If the user steals psych up, it will target the Pokémon that used psych up.  If the user was the original target of psych up, and the Pokémon that originally used it's affected by pressure, it will only lose 1 PP.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
